Function XLOOKUP(lookup_value As Variant, lookup_array As Range, return_array As Range, Optional not_found As String = "Not Found") As Variant
    Dim i As Long
    
    For i = 1 To lookup_array.Count
        If lookup_array.Cells(i).Value = lookup_value Then
            XLOOKUP = return_array.Cells(i).Value
            Exit Function
        End If
    Next i
    
    XLOOKUP = 0
End Function
